name: market for maize silage, Swiss integrated production | maize silage, Swiss integrated production | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20437/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the supply of 1 kg of 'maize silage, Swiss integrated production' from activities that produce it within the geography of CH. Transportation is included in this market, based on Valsasina, L. (2016), "Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent database version 3.3, ecoinvent Centre, ZÃ¼rich, Switzerland", available on the ecoinvent's website http://www.ecoinvent.org/. More details can be found in the exchange comments of the transportation. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'maize silage, Swiss integrated production' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of 'maize silage, Swiss integrated production' to the consumers of this product. Transport is included.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0119:Growing of other non-perennial crops

exchanges.description: The transport distances in this market are taken from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org).
